This is the format that will be used to print the box the user selects the poll answers from. You can use the following keywords:
  • %question% - the question of the poll, eg. 'What Colour is Blue?'
  • %date% - the date the poll was created on
  • %option_list% - a list of the options the user can select (radio buttons and labels)
  • %vote_button% - a button that votes for the selected option, then takes the user to the results screen
  • %vote_button_javascript% - the javascript for %vote_button% - insert into an image or a link, eg. <img alt="Pic1" src="Pic1.jpg" onClick="%vote_button_javascript%" />< /li>
  • %view_results% - a text link to the results, without the user voting
  • %view_results_url% - a URL pointing to the results, for inclusion inside an <a href="..."> tag
  • %view_past_questions% - a link to a list of previous questions, from where you can select the results
  • %view_past_questions_url% - a URL pointing to the list of previous questions, for inclusion inside an <a href="..."> tag

This is the format that will be used to print the question results after the user votes, elects to view the results, or views a past poll. You can use the following keywords:
  • %question% - the question of the poll, eg. 'What Colour is Blue?'
  • %date% - the date the poll was created on
  • %graph% - a horizontal bar graph of the results
  • %key% - a key matching an option number on the bar graph to an option description
  • %view_past_questions% - a link to a list of previous questions, from where you can select the results
  • %view_past_questions_url% - a URL pointing to the list of previous questions, for inclusion inside an <a href="..."> tag

This is the format that will be used to print the box the user selects the poll answers from. You can use the following keywords:
  • %question_list% - a list of the previous questions, displayed inside <ul></ul> (list) tags
  • %question_list_date% - a list of the previous questions, displayed inside <ul></ul> (list) tags, with the questions' creation dates
  • %question_list_no_active% - a list of the previous questions, displayed inside <ul></ul> (list) tags, without the active question
  • %question_list_date_no_active% - a list of the previous questions, displayed inside <ul></ul> (list) tags, with the questions' creation dates, but without the active question
  • %active_question% - a link to the active question (already present in %question_list%)
  • %active_question_date% - a link to the active question (already present in %question_list%), with the question's creation date
